attributes.action: Get David Cameron out of parliament
attributes.background: He's allowing thousands off immigrants into the country to help other people yet cut cancer drugs that save people's lifes why not put our people first. How can England feed/support immigrants yet not a cancer drug fund

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/104471

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
